title: cuda runtime error
body_html:
I just run some training code and this error raised occasionally. Is there any idea to fix this issue?

THCudaCheck FAIL file=/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorCopy.cu line=190 error=4 : unspecified launch failure
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "main.py", line 301, in
main()
File "main.py", line 124, in main
train(train_loader, model, criterion, optimizer, epoch)
File "main.py", line 166, in train
output = model(input_var)
File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 224, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 61, in forward
return self.gather(outputs, self.output_device)
File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 73, in gather
return gather(outputs, output_device, dim=self.dim)
File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 50, in gather
return gather_map(outputs)
File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 46, in gather_map
return Gather(target_device, dim=dim)(*outputs)
File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/functions.py", line 39, in forward
return comm.gather(inputs, self.dim, self.target_device)
File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/cuda/comm.py", line 204, in gather
result.narrow(dim, chunk_start, tensor.size(dim)).copy(tensor, True)
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (4) : unspecified launch failure at /pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorCopy.cu:190
terminate called without an active exception
Aborted (core dumped)

body:
I just run some training code and this error raised occasionally. Is there any idea to fix this issue?

THCudaCheck FAIL file=/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorCopy.cu line=190 error=4 : unspecified launch failure
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 301, in <module>
    main()
  File "main.py", line 124, in main
    train(train_loader, model, criterion, optimizer, epoch)
  File "main.py", line 166, in train
    output = model(input_var)
  File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 224, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 61, in forward
    return self.gather(outputs, self.output_device)
  File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 73, in gather
    return gather(outputs, output_device, dim=self.dim)
  File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 50, in gather
    return gather_map(outputs)
  File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/scatter_gather.py", line 46, in gather_map
    return Gather(target_device, dim=dim)(*outputs)
  File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/_functions.py", line 39, in forward
    return comm.gather(inputs, self.dim, self.target_device)
  File "/home/rusu5516/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/cuda/comm.py", line 204, in gather
    result.narrow(dim, chunk_start, tensor.size(dim)).copy_(tensor, True)
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (4) : unspecified launch failure at /pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorCopy.cu:190
terminate called without an active exception
Aborted (core dumped)
